entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS
MORE HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
